page.title: 10PRINCES ROW LONGWORTH (2)
page.content: The house was left to ruin a bit and then my dad bought it and did it up.He knocked the funny end down and rebuilt a new end wall.He replaced some of the woodwork as well.Later he built a garage.Lastly he put a new door through into the east end cottage. On the ground floor we have the laundry ,the playroom,the east end bathroom,the sitting room,the kitchen,and the hall. On the first floor are the four bedrooms,the west end bathroom and the study.The house is heated by night storage heaters and an open coal/log fire in the sitting room. In our house we have the following appliances:fridge,oven and hob, spin dryer,washing machine,television, several radios,vacuum cleaner,heater and hair dryer.
